title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        Cottonwood cove at dusk.    Â    Lake Mead National Recreation Area is open year-round, 24 hours, 7 days a week. Some beaches and other areas are day-use only, from dawn til dusk. These areas are marked with signs.   The Alan Bible Visitor Center is open 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m daily. Please call 702-293-8990 for more information. The Visitor Center will be closed the following holidays: Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day and New Years Day.
